name: Jeevesh's Email Regex
content:
Email Validations
				     -----------------------
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                     For Local Part:-Only underscore(_) and Dot(.) is acceptable in local part
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 Acceptable                                                                       
=========
Local Parts:-  if abc..abc @domain.com then error msg or  abc_ _abc @domain.com then error msg          
   (No consecutive underscores or dots allowed.)

Error Message if user entered wrong special characters in Email address :-
Only letters, numbers, underscores, and one dot (.) are allowed.

>>abc1.1@domain.com

>>abc.abc@domain.com

>>abc_41.15768@domain.com

>>12345@domain.com

>>12.12.23@domain.com

>>ABC.ABC.ABC.ABC0046@domain.com

>>abc_123_4595@domain.com

abc@asdas.co.in
Not Acceptable Local Parts                                                                    
====================                                                                     

abc.@insta.com
abc..de@insta.com
abc-@insta.com
abc-def@insta.com
abc+@insta.com
abc123..45@insta.com
abc%@insta.com
abc\@insta.com
abc/@insta.com
abc@insta-.com

ABC.ABC.ABC.ABC0046@domain.com.com.com
ABC.ABC.ABC.ABC0046@aomain.com.com.com

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------                                              For Domain Part:-Only Dot(.)allowed, Special Characters not allowed
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Acceptable domains:-
--------------------------
abc@insta123.com
abc@inta.co.in  


Not Acceptable Domains:-
===================

abc@@insta.com.com.com
abc@insta..com
abc@insta%.com
abc@insta/.com
abc@insta\.com
